properties.name: menus
properties.description: An array of menu items and their corresponding component to render when the menu item is selected

properties.name: open
properties.description: Toggles open (visible) state of the `.menu` element

properties.name: selectedMenu
properties.description: Menu item ID property of the currently selected menu item

properties.name: animateMenuOpen
properties.description: Toggles open (visible) state of the `.menu` element

events.name: ItemNavMenuClosed
events.description: Fires whenever the menu drawer is closed

cssProperties.name: --menuButtonLabelDisplay
cssProperties.description: Display value for button text label
